attributes.action: review FSCS levy for £70 milliion or destroy financial intermediaries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
FSCS Levy

It has come to our attention that due to the failure of Pacific Continental securities, Square Mile Securities and Keydata the debt is some £70 million and it has been stated that the cost sf this debt will be falling to investment intermediaries.

We are astounded that due to the failure of these companies because of   general incompetance, over trading and poor management that the investment intermediares have to " bail these companies out". Not only this but you expect the levy to be paid within 30 days

Most intermediaries will have no dealings with these companies in any format.

This will force many small business to close with valuable employees joining the unemployment queue and professional
financial planners unable to provide advice. My understanding is that you are looking to support the small business community?

You can't expect to steal our hard money to pay for the failings of others, can you?

We require a full formal review of your process and policy in relation to this matter.

This is an urgent matter
